products.name: BMW M2 Competition

products.name: BMW M5 Competition
products.shortDescription: Ultimate performance sedan with AWD system.
products.description: BMW M5 Competition with 617hp twin-turbo V8 engine and M xDrive all-wheel drive. The perfect blend of luxury sedan comfort and supercar performance.

features.name: M xDrive System
features.description: Intelligent all-wheel drive system with rear-wheel drive mode.

comments.message: Best performance sedan on the market, absolutely stunning.

products.name: BMW E39 M5
products.shortDescription: Classic M5 with naturally aspirated V8 engine.
products.description: Legendary BMW E39 M5 with the iconic S62 5.0L V8 engine. A true driver's car representing the golden era of BMW M performance vehicles.

features.name: S62 V8 Engine
features.description: High-revving naturally aspirated V8 with 400hp and incredible sound.

comments.message: Nothing beats the sound of a naturally aspirated V8.
Classic M5, pure driving perfection.

products.name: BMW E30 M3
products.shortDescription: Legendary homologation special with racing heritage.
products.description: Iconic BMW E30 M3 with the legendary S14 engine. A true collector's car and the foundation of BMW's M division success in motorsport.

features.name: S14 Racing Engine
features.description: High-revving 4-cylinder engine derived from BMW's Formula 1 technology.

comments.message: The holy grail of BMW M cars, absolutely pristine example.

products.name: BMW E34 M5
products.shortDescription: First M5 with V8 power and timeless design.
products.description: BMW E34 M5 featuring the S38 3.8L inline-6 engine. The perfect balance of performance and elegance that defined the modern sports sedan category.

features.name: S38 Inline-6
features.description: High-performance naturally aspirated inline-6 with motorsport heritage.

comments.message: Classic BMW engineering at its finest.
Timeless design and incredible driving dynamics.
